description.value:
You are trained with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Composite Longbow]{Composite Longbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Composite Shortbow]{Composite Shortbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Glaive]{Glaives}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Halberd]{Halberds}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Longbow]{Longbows}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Longspear]{Longspears}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Longsword]{Longswords}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Shortbow]{Shortbows}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Spear]{Spears}.

In addition, you gain access to all uncommon hobgoblin weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial hobgoblin weapons are simple weapons and advanced hobgoblin weapons are martial weapons.
